question: During Mahatma Gandhi's 150th birth anniversary How many students of colleges and universities of Lucknow set a record by reading books together on Mahatma Gandhi's life?
explanation: During Mahatma Gandhi's 150th birth anniversary 9.7 lakhs students of colleges and universities of Lucknow set a record (World Book of Records) by reading books together on Mahatma Gandhi's life. The name of the event was "Padhe Lucknow, Badhe Lucknow".
